name: Code Block
description: Syntax-highlighted code display component with multiple language support.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-code-block language="javascript">
function greet(name) {
    return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet('World'));
</dotbox-code-block>

<!-- Multi-line code with HTML entities -->
<dotbox-code-block language="html">
<div class='container'>
    <h1>Welcome</h1>
    <p>Hello World!</p>
</div>
</dotbox-code-block>

<!-- CSS example -->
<dotbox-code-block language="css">
.btn {
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.375rem;
    background: var(--color-primary);
    color: white;
}
</dotbox-code-block>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
const codeBlock = new Dotbox.CodeBlock({
    language: 'javascript',
    code: 'function greet(name) {\\n    return \`Hello, \${name}!\`;\\n}\\n\\nconsole.log(greet(\'World\'));'
});

document.body.appendChild(codeBlock.getElement());
</script>

description: Navigation menu component with selectable items.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-menu 
    data-items='[{"id":"home","label":"Home"},{"id":"about","label":"About"},{"id":"services","label":"Services"},{"id":"contact","label":"Contact"}]'
    selected="home"
    bordered="true">
</dotbox-menu>

<!-- With routing mode (hash navigation) -->
<dotbox-menu 
    data-items='[{"id":"dashboard","label":"Dashboard"},{"id":"analytics","label":"Analytics"},{"id":"settings","label":"Settings"}]'
    selected="dashboard"
    routing-mode>
</dotbox-menu>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelector('dotbox-menu').addEventListener('dotbox-select', (e) => {
    console.log('Selected menu item:', e.detail.selectedId);
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
// Standard menu
const menu = new Dotbox.Menu({
    items: [
        { id: 'home', label: 'Home' },
        { id: 'about', label: 'About' },
        { id: 'services', label: 'Services' },
        { id: 'contact', label: 'Contact' }
    ],
    selected: 'home',
    onSelect: (id) => console.log('Selected:', id)
});

// Menu with routing mode (hash navigation)
const routingMenu = new Dotbox.Menu({
    items: [
        { id: 'dashboard', label: 'Dashboard' },
        { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics' },
        { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings' }
    ],
    routingMode: true, // Enable hash-based routing
    onSelect: (id) => console.log('Navigated to:', id)
});

document.body.appendChild(menu.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(routingMenu.getElement());
</script>

name: Loader
description: Animated SVG loading indicator with multiple sizes and color variants.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-loader></dotbox-loader>
<dotbox-loader variant="secondary"></dotbox-loader>
<dotbox-loader variant="success"></dotbox-loader>
<dotbox-loader variant="danger"></dotbox-loader>

<!-- Different sizes -->
<dotbox-loader size="small"></dotbox-loader>
<dotbox-loader size="medium"></dotbox-loader>
<dotbox-loader size="large"></dotbox-loader>

<!-- Programmatic control -->
<dotbox-loader id="myLoader" variant="primary" size="large"></dotbox-loader>

<script>
const loader = document.getElementById('myLoader');

// Show/hide programmatically
setTimeout(() => loader.hide(), 3000);
setTimeout(() => loader.show(), 5000);

// Change properties
setTimeout(() => {
    loader.setVariant('success');
    loader.setSize('small');
}, 7000);
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
// Basic loader
const loader = new Dotbox.Loader({
    size: 'medium',
    variant: 'primary'
});

// Different variants
const successLoader = new Dotbox.Loader({
    size: 'large',
    variant: 'success'
});

const dangerLoader = new Dotbox.Loader({
    size: 'small',
    variant: 'danger'
});

// Add to page
document.body.appendChild(loader.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(successLoader.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(dangerLoader.getElement());

// Control programmatically
setTimeout(() => {
    loader.setVariant('secondary');
    successLoader.hide();
}, 3000);
</script>

name: Checkbox
description: Animated checkbox component with SVG checkmark and smooth transitions.
codeWC:
<!-- Web Components (Primary) -->
<dotbox-checkbox label="Accept terms and conditions"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Newsletter subscription" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Disabled option" disabled></dotbox-checkbox>

<!-- Different sizes -->
<dotbox-checkbox label="Small checkbox" size="small"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Medium checkbox" size="medium"></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Large checkbox" size="large"></dotbox-checkbox>

<!-- Different variants -->
<dotbox-checkbox label="Primary" variant="primary" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Success" variant="success" checked></dotbox-checkbox>
<dotbox-checkbox label="Danger" variant="danger" checked></dotbox-checkbox>

<!-- Form integration -->
<dotbox-checkbox label="Checkbox with name" name="preferences" value="notifications" checked></dotbox-checkbox>

<!-- Event handling -->
<script>
document.querySelectorAll('dotbox-checkbox').forEach(checkbox => {
    checkbox.addEventListener('dotbox-change', (e) => {
        console.log('Checkbox changed:', e.detail);
    });
});
</script>
codeJS:
<!-- JavaScript API (Alternative) -->
<script>
// Basic checkbox
const checkbox = new Dotbox.Checkbox({
    label: 'Accept terms and conditions',
    checked: false,
    onChange: (e) => console.log('Checked:', e.target.checked)
});

// Different variants and sizes
const successCheckbox = new Dotbox.Checkbox({
    label: 'Success variant',
    variant: 'success',
    size: 'large',
    checked: true
});

const smallCheckbox = new Dotbox.Checkbox({
    label: 'Small size',
    size: 'small',
    name: 'preferences',
    value: 'notifications'
});

// Add to page
document.body.appendChild(checkbox.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(successCheckbox.getElement());
document.body.appendChild(smallCheckbox.getElement());

// Control programmatically
setTimeout(() => {
    checkbox.setChecked(true);
    successCheckbox.setVariant('danger');
    smallCheckbox.setDisabled(true);
}, 3000);
</script>
